question.title: ScriptEngine is returned null
question.body:
I have recently upgraded my lambda function to java17

and i am facing issue with below code

ScriptEngineManager manager = new ScriptEngineManager();

ScriptEngine engine = manager.getEngineByName("JavaScript");

here i am getting engine as null

i have added the gradle dependency for nashorn

implementation 'org.openjdk.nashorn:nashorn-core:15.0' as Nashorn engine is removed from java 17

but still test cases are failing as engine is returned null not sure if I am missing something here.

Can someone help me in this.

Thanks in advance.
